explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses a new classification method in the context of machine learning, specifically focusing on support vector machines.
explanations.supervised learning: The proposed method, ER-SVM, is a classification technique, which falls under supervised learning.
explanations.classification: The paper introduces a new classification method called extended robust SVM (ER-SVM).
explanations.support vector machine: The paper focuses on extending and improving the support vector machine (SVM) method, specifically the v-SVM.
explanations.SVM: The paper discusses an extension of the SVM method, referred to as ER-SVM, which is based on financial risk minimization.
